name: WelcomeToHell
description:
Welcome To Hell!

It's another day at the office processing the sinners that make their way into Hell, and it's your job to speak with them to find the perfect circle of Hell to live in for the rest of eternity.

But you have rent to pay, and if you can't make ends meet then it's eternal torture and damnation for you! Luckily, your bonus scheme involves customer satisfaction, so if you word your questions correctly for the client and get them where they need to go, you should have no problems.
